title: [JIT] [Script] not support short-cut eval in And
body_html:
@torch.jit.script
def testAnd(t):
    i = 5
    if False and t[i]:
        ret = t[i]
    else:
        ret = t[0]
    return ret

testAnd(torch.randn(4))

error:


RuntimeError:
select(): index 5 out of range for tensor of size [4] at dimension 0:
operation failed in interpreter:
@torch.jit.script
def testAnd(t):
    i = 5
    if False and t[i]:
                 ~~~ <--- HERE
        ret = t[i]
    else:
        ret = t[0]
    return ret
